tasks.task_description: Add new dependencies for enhanced UI/UX features
Add favorites system with persistent storage
Add user profile and settings page
Create enhanced restaurant details with image gallery

description: Enhance FlavorFinder UI/UX and add new features including search, filters, favorites, animations, and improved visual design
context: Added new dependencies for enhanced UI/UX features including shared_preferences for persistent storage, animations for smooth transitions, shimmer for loading effects, rating bar, carousel slider, and staggered animations

Created comprehensive search functionality with filters including cuisine, rating, and sorting options. Added favorites system with persistent storage using SharedPreferences. Implemented smooth animations and transitions using flutter_staggered_animations and animations package. Created user profile and settings page with quick stats and menu options. Enhanced restaurant cards with favorite functionality, status badges, and improved visual design. Added promotional banners with carousel slider and smooth page indicators. Created order history page with order tracking and reorder functionality. Enhanced the main restaurant list page with promotional banners, quick actions, and filter chips.

Created comprehensive onboarding experience with smooth animations, page indicators, and feature introduction. Added dark mode support with theme bloc and persistent storage. Implemented push notifications service setup with notification settings page and promotional notification scheduling. Enhanced the profile page with theme toggle and notification settings navigation. Created enhanced app theme with both light and dark mode support. Updated main.dart with onboarding flow, theme support, and notification service initialization.
